Package gobblin.runtime.listeners

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CloseableJobListener
    Extension of JobListener that also extends Closeable.
    JobListener
    An interface for classes used for callback on job state changes.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractCloseableJobListener
    Extension of AbstractJobListener that also extends CloseableJobListener.
    AbstractJobListener
    An abstract implementation of JobListener which ensures that subclasses do not have to implement all lifecycle events.
    EmailNotificationJobListener
    An implementation of JobListener that sends email notifications.
    JobExecutionEventSubmitterListener  
    JobListeners
    Static utility methods pertaining to JobListeners.
    RunOnceJobListener
    An implementation of JobListener for run-once jobs.
